General.Name: Rani Zim Shopping Centers
General.Description: Rani Zim Shopping Centers Ltd engages in the development, construction, and management of commercial projects in Israel. It operates, manages, and rents shopping centers. Rani Zim Shopping Centers Ltd is based in Petah Tikva, Israel.
